title.rendered: Exploring fintech ecosystems across four markets in Asia: Australia, Indonesia, Singapore and Vietnam

content.rendered:
Join us for an insightful and engaging webinar as we delve into the dynamic world of fintech ecosystems across four diverse markets. This free online event will introduce you to the fintech landscapes of these markets, shedding light on their unique characteristics and exploring the distinct advantages they offer.

Agenda

1. Introduction of the fintech ecosystems

Our experts will kick off the webinar with an overview of the fintech ecosystems in each of the four markets. You will learn about the key players, regulatory frameworks, technological innovations, and emerging trends shaping the four financial technology landscapes.

2. Panel discussion about the advantages and weaknesses of each market

During this segment, our speakers will spotlight the notable differences between the four markets and discuss their relative merits and material advantages. From local consumer behaviours to market maturity and regulatory idiosyncrasies, you will gain valuable insights into the factors that contribute to each market’s uniqueness and discover how these distinctions influence the strategic choices made by fintech businesses.

Speakers

  • Blair Lucas, Group Commercial Director, Acclime Group
  • Karim Saleh, Country Head, Acclime Indonesia
  • Matthew Lourey, Managing Partner, Acclime Vietnam
  • Thomas Chan, Managing Director, Acclime Singapore
  • Moderated by: Vlad Savin, Head of Business Development

Whether you are an industry professional seeking to expand your fintech business or an enthusiast curious about the evolving financial technology landscape, this webinar offers an exceptional opportunity to grasp the intricacies of these markets and their fintech potential.

The webinar is free, but registration is required. Please click here to register now. Secure your spot today and be part of this exploration of fintech ecosystems across four diverse markets in Asia.
